fingerprint_sha256_40.description: SHA256 hash of file content (binary), first 40 hex chars, deterministic fingerprint
fingerprint_sha256_40.title: Fingerprint Sha256 40

path.description: Relative path to derived file from data/derived/
path.title: Path

DatasetRecord.title: DatasetRecord

Specification for a single strategy parameter.

Used by GUI to generate appropriate input widgets.

candidate_run_ids.description: List of candidate run IDs to include
candidate_run_ids.title: Candidate Run Ids

job_id.description: Job ID for the portfolio build
job_id.title: Job Id

PortfolioLinksV1.description: Links to related resources for a portfolio.
PortfolioLinksV1.title: PortfolioLinksV1

QualityMetrics.description:
Contract goals:
- Internal grading code historically uses: top1/top3/top5/bucket_coverage_ratio
- Hardening tests expect: top1_score/effective_n/bucket_coverage
We support BOTH via real fields + deterministic properties.
QualityMetrics.title: QualityMetrics

QualitySourceRef.description: Reference to the source of the plan.
QualitySourceRef.title: QualitySourceRef

SnapshotCreatePayload.description: Payload for creating a data snapshot from raw bars.

raw_bars.description: List of raw bar dictionaries with timestamp, open, high, low, close, volume
raw_bars.title: Raw Bars

SnapshotCreatePayload.title: SnapshotCreatePayload

SnapshotMetadata.description: Immutable metadata of a data snapshot.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when snapshot was created (may include fractional seconds)
created_at.title: Created At

manifest_sha256.description: SHA256 of the manifest JSON (excluding this field)
manifest_sha256.title: Manifest Sha256

normalized_sha256.description: SHA256 of the normalized bars JSON
normalized_sha256.title: Normalized Sha256

raw_sha256.description: SHA256 of the raw bars JSON
raw_sha256.title: Raw Sha256

SnapshotMetadata.title: SnapshotMetadata

StrategyHeadlineMetricsV1.title: StrategyHeadlineMetricsV1

StrategySeriesV1.description: Time series data for a strategy.

Strategy specification for GUI consumption.

Contains metadata and parameter schema for automatic UI generation.
GUI must NOT hardcode any strategy parameters.

TimePointV1.description: A timestamp-value pair for time series data.
TimePointV1.title: TimePointV1

get.description: List artifacts tree for a batch (read-only).

schema.title: Response Get Batch Artifacts Api V1 Batches  Batch Id  Artifacts Get
Response Freeze Batch Api V1 Batches  Batch Id  Freeze Post

get.description: Get batch index.json (read-only).

schema.title: Response Get Batch Index Api V1 Batches  Batch Id  Index Get

get.description: Get batch metadata.
Get batch execution status (read-only).
Get batch summary (read-only).

post.description:
Register an existing snapshot as a dataset (controlled mutation).

Contract:
- snapshot_id must exist under snapshots root
- Dataset registry is append‑only (no overwrites)
- Conflict detection: if snapshot already registered → 409
- Returns dataset_id (deterministic) and registry entry

schema.title: Response Register Snapshot Endpoint Api V1 Datasets Registry Register Snapshot Post
Response List Snapshots Api V1 Datasets Snapshots Get

post.description:
Create a deterministic snapshot from raw bars.

Contract:
- Input: raw bars (list of dicts) + symbol + timeframe + optional transform_version
- Deterministic: same input → same snapshot_id and normalized_sha256
- Immutable: snapshot directory is write‑once (atomic temp‑file replace)
- Timezone‑aware: uses UTC timestamps (datetime.now(timezone.utc))
- Returns SnapshotMetadata with raw_sha256, normalized_sha256, manifest_sha256 chain

get.description:
Batch-level compare cards from exported season package (read-only).
- Reads exports/seasons/{season}/replay_index.json
- Does NOT require artifacts/ directory

schema.title: Response Export Season Compare Batches Api V1 Exports Seasons  Season  Compare Batches Get

get.description:
Grouped leaderboard from exported season package (read-only).
- Reads exports/seasons/{season}/replay_index.json
- Does NOT require artifacts/ directory

schema.title: Response Export Season Compare Leaderboard Api V1 Exports Seasons  Season  Compare Leaderboard Get

get.description:
Cross-batch TopK from exported season package (read-only).
- Reads exports/seasons/{season}/replay_index.json
- Does NOT require artifacts/ directory
- Missing/corrupt summaries are skipped (never 500 the whole season)

schema.title: Response Export Season Compare Topk Api V1 Exports Seasons  Season  Compare Topk Get

get.description: Service identity endpoint for topology observability.

schema.title: Response Identity Api V1 Identity Get
Response List Jobs Endpoint Api V1 Jobs Get

post.description:
Create a job (thin proxy to supervisor).

Accepts GUI params format:
{
    "strategy_id": "...",
    "instrument": "...",
    "timeframe": "...",
    "run_mode": "...",  # "backtest", "research", "optimize"
    "season": "...",
    "dataset": "..."  # optional
}

schema.title: Response Submit Job Endpoint Api V1 Jobs Post

post.description:
Request abort of a job (QUEUED or RUNNING).
Sets abort_requested flag; supervisor will handle killing and transition.

schema.title: Response Abort Job Endpoint Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Abort Post

get.description:
Return the absolute path to the job evidence directory after containment check.

Security:
- Must ensure job_id does not contain path traversal.
- Must ensure the resolved path is within the locked evidence root (outputs/jobs/).
- Returns 404 if evidence directory does not exist.

Read-only endpoint for GUI.

Contract:
- GET only
- Must not access filesystem during request handling
- If registries are not preloaded: return 503
- Deterministic ordering: datasets sorted by id

post.description:
Prime registries cache (explicit trigger).

This endpoint allows the UI to manually trigger registry loading
when the automatic startup preload fails (e.g., missing files).

Returns detailed feedback about what succeeded/failed.

schema.title: Response Prime Registries Api V1 Meta Prime Post

get.description:
Read-only endpoint for GUI.

Contract:
- GET only
- Must not access filesystem during request handling
- If registries are not preloaded: return 503
- Deterministic ordering: strategies sorted by strategy_id; params sorted by name

Return a human-usable summary of outputs (jobs and portfolios) for clean UI navigation.

Contract:
- Version 1.0 schema
- No filesystem scanning (use supervisor job store)
- No filesystem paths returned
- Dumb client: UI must use this endpoint, not scan filesystem

schema.title: Response Get Outputs Summary Api V1 Outputs Summary Get
Response List Portfolio Plans Api V1 Portfolio Plans Get

post.description:
Create a deterministic portfolio plan from an export (controlled mutation).

Contract:
- Read‑only over exports tree (no artifacts, no engine)
- Deterministic tie‑break ordering
- Controlled mutation: writes only under outputs/portfolio/plans/{plan_id}/
- Hash chain audit (plan_manifest.json with self‑hash)
- Idempotent: if plan already exists, returns existing plan (200).
- Returns full plan (including weights, summary, constraints report)

get.description:
Get a portfolio plan by ID (read‑only).

Returns:
    Full portfolio_plan.json content (including universe, weights, summaries).

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Plan Api V1 Portfolio Plans  Plan Id  Get

get.description:
Compute quality metrics for a portfolio plan (read‑only).

Contract:
- Zero‑write: only reads plan package files, never writes
- Deterministic: same plan → same quality report
- Returns PlanQualityReport with grade (GREEN/YELLOW/RED) and reasons

post.description:
Compute quality metrics and write quality files (controlled mutation).

Contract:
- Read‑only over plan package files
- Controlled mutation: writes only three files under plan_dir:
    - plan_quality.json
    - plan_quality_checksums.json
    - plan_quality_manifest.json
- Idempotent: identical content → no mtime change
- Returns PlanQualityReport (same as GET endpoint)

Submit a portfolio build request.

Creates a BUILD_PORTFOLIO_V2 job and returns job_id immediately.
The portfolio_id may be null initially and will be discoverable from job evidence.

get.description:
Get basic portfolio metadata.

Returns portfolio ID, creation timestamp (if available), and URLs to
report and artifacts.

Get artifact index for a portfolio admission.

Lists all files under outputs/portfolios/<portfolio_id>/admission/
with metadata and download URLs.

Serve a single artifact file from the portfolio admission directory.

Security:
- filename must be a simple basename (no slashes, no path traversal) -> 403
- Must enforce containment within outputs/portfolios/<portfolio_id>/admission/ -> 403
- Returns 404 if file not found (valid basename but missing)
- Returns 404 if admission directory does not exist (portfolio unknown)

Return the absolute path to the portfolio admission directory after containment check.

Security:
- Must ensure portfolio_id does not contain path traversal.
- Must ensure the resolved path is within the locked evidence root (outputs/portfolios/).
- Returns 404 if admission directory does not exist.
Readiness endpoint for UI gates.

schema.title: Response Readiness Api V1 Readiness Get

get.description:
Check if bars and features are ready for a given season, dataset, and timeframe.

Contract:
- Returns readiness status without performing any writes.
- If bars/features files exist, returns paths (relative to outputs root).
- If missing, returns false with optional error.
- Must not construct filesystem paths in UI; UI must call this endpoint.

Return list of dataset IDs (simple strings).

Contract:
- Returns simple array of strings, e.g., ["None", "VX", "ZN", ...]
- If dataset registry not loaded, returns 503.
- Must not access filesystem during request handling.

schema.title: Response Registry Datasets Api V1 Registry Datasets Get

get.description:
Return list of instrument symbols (keys from instruments config).

Contract:
- Returns simple array of strings, e.g., ["MNQ", "MES", ...]
- If instruments config not loaded, returns 503.
- Must not access filesystem during request handling.

schema.title: Response Registry Instruments Api V1 Registry Instruments Get

get.description:
Return list of strategy IDs (simple strings).

Contract:
- Returns simple array of strings, e.g., ["s1_v1", "s2_v1", ...]
- If strategy registry not loaded, returns 503.
- Must not access filesystem during request handling.

schema.title: Response Registry Strategies Api V1 Registry Strategies Get

get.description:
Return list of timeframe display names (simple strings).

Contract:
- Returns simple array of strings, e.g., ["15m", "30m", "60m", "120m", "240m"]
- If timeframe registry not loaded, returns 503.
- Must not access filesystem during request handling.

schema.title: Response Registry Timeframes Api V1 Registry Timeframes Get

get.description:
Return precomputed PortfolioReportV1 JSON for a portfolio admission.

Contract:
- If outputs/portfolios/<portfolio_id>/admission/portfolio_report_v1.json exists:
  - return its JSON content with application/json
- Else:
  - 404 with clear message: "portfolio_report_v1.json not found; run portfolio build or upgrade workers"
- No heavy compute inside request handler.

Return precomputed StrategyReportV1 JSON for a job.

Contract:
- If outputs/jobs/<job_id>/strategy_report_v1.json exists:
  - return its JSON content with application/json
- Else:
  - 404 with clear message: "strategy_report_v1.json not found; run job or upgrade workers"
- No heavy compute inside request handler.

Read-only endpoint for run status observability via HTTP pull (Heartbeat Pattern).

Contract:
- GET only, no mutation
- If run_status.json exists → return JSON
- If missing → return default IDLE state
- No partial JSON ever observed (atomic writes guarantee)
- No Socket.IO / WebSocket / SSE

schema.title: Response Get Run Status Api V1 Run Status Get

get.description:
Batch-level compare cards for a season (read-only).
Source of truth:
  - season_index/{season}/season_index.json
  - artifacts/{batch_id}/summary.json (best-effort)

schema.title: Response Season Compare Batches Api V1 Seasons  Season  Compare Batches Get

get.description:
Grouped leaderboard for a season (read-only).
group_by: strategy_id | dataset_id
per_group: keep top N items per group

schema.title: Response Season Compare Leaderboard Api V1 Seasons  Season  Compare Leaderboard Get

get.description:
Cross-batch TopK for a season (read-only).
- Reads season_index/{season}/season_index.json
- Reads artifacts/{batch_id}/summary.json for each batch
- Missing/corrupt summaries are skipped (never 500 the whole season)

schema.title: Response Season Compare Topk Api V1 Seasons  Season  Compare Topk Get

post.description:
Export a frozen season into outputs/exports/seasons/{season}/ (controlled mutation).
Requirements:
  - season must be frozen (403 if not)
  - season_index must exist (404 if missing)

schema.title: Response Export Season Api V1 Seasons  Season  Export Post
Response Freeze Season Api V1 Seasons  Season  Freeze Post

get.description: Get season_index.json (read-only).

schema.title: Response Get Season Index Api V1 Seasons  Season  Index Get

get.description: Get season metadata.

schema.title: Response Get Season Metadata Api V1 Seasons  Season  Metadata Get

patch.description:
Update season metadata (controlled mutation).
Frozen rules:
- cannot unfreeze a frozen season
- tags/note allowed

schema.title: Response Update Season Metadata Api V1 Seasons  Season  Metadata Patch

post.description:
Rebuild season index (controlled mutation).
- Reads artifacts/* metadata/index/summary (read-only)
- Writes season_index/{season}/season_index.json (atomic)
- If season is frozen -> 403

schema.title: Response Rebuild Season Index Api V1 Seasons  Season  Rebuild Index Post
